knimeNode.name: GeneticBackgroundModel
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node computes frequencies indicating the incidence of variants in a gene.

fullDescription.intro: This node computes frequencies indicating the incidence of variants in a gene. All variants in the input file that have been annotated by VEP are integrated in the computation of gene-based variant frequencies. The frequencies can be computed based on genotypes or allele counts/numbers (if genotypes are not available). These frequencies can be used as a background model for the analysis of case-control studies.
fullDescription.option: Choose whether frequencies are calculated based on genotypes or allele counts/numbers.

option.name: Field IDs indicating the AC and AN to be used

fullDescription.option: Set field IDs of the allele counts (in general AC) and allele numbers (in general AN).

ports.inPort: Input VCF file with VEP annotated variants.
ports.outPort: Cell 0: Path to the resulting gene model file.
